russian.print: Yvonne: I’d like to book a room for the next week.
You: Uh, okay. What’s your name?
Yvonne: Yvonne. Did you not read the dialogue?
You: Uh... What tier would you like?
You: Excellent choice - how about room 12?
You: Wait, are you a guitar player?
Yvonne: No, this is strictly for business purposes.

russian_yes.print: Yvonne: Excellent, could I get my key? Thank you.

russian_no.print: Yvonne: What a shame. Better be extra careful then, they’re watching.
Yvonne: Could I get my key please?
-- You remember to give her the key... --

shampoo.print: Yvonne: Hey, my room’s out of shampoo. Do you mind if I get more?
You: Sorry, we only have conditioner at the moment.
You: You might have to wait until tomorrow until we give out shampoo again.
Yvonne: Hey come on, I really need it. Can’t you just sneak one under the counter for me?

shampoo_yes.print: Yvonne: Thanks. I’ll be sure to put in a good word for you to my bosses.

shampoo_no.print: You: Sorry, don’t want to get sent to the gulags by my boss or anything.
I’ll have to go out and pick some up then.
You’ve just made this game a little harder for yourself though, good luck.

sellToaster.print: Yvonne: Hi! I was wondering if you had any space to store extra luggage.
You: Is that a tuba case?
Yvonne: You betcha! But there isn’t a tuba in here.
Yvonne: It’s none of your business, that’s what it is.
Yvonne: Anyways, has anyone mysterious caught your eye recently?
Yvonne: There have been a lot of oddballs floating around you know.
Yvonne: Just keep an eye out for Russians.
Yvonne: Anyways, I’ve got this old toaster for sale.
Yvonne: I’m only selling it for a dollar.

sellToaster_yes.print: You: Sure, I’ll take it off your hands!
Yvonne: Good luck getting that old thing working though.

sellToaster_no.print: Yvonne: Darn, I was sure you’d buy it.
Yvonne: Guess I’ll need to find someone else.

soap.print: Yvonne: Hey. I ran out of soap.
Yvonne: Could I please get some more?
Yvonne: Business operates as per usual.

soap_yes.print: Yvonne: Hope you’re enjoying the game my friend.
Yvonne: And keep your eyes peeled, you don’t know who might disappear next...

soap_no.print: You: Sorry, no can do. We’re out of stock.
Yvonne: But I saw you giving them out earlier!
Yvonne: Well, I hope you’re enjoying the game.
Yvonne: You’ll never know who'll disappear next.
